basics.name: Travis McKenzie
basics.summary: Currently employed at Liberty Mutual Insurance as a Sr. Business Analyst, I am pursuing a Masters of Data Science at Willamette University. My focus is on data science and analytics, with a strong foundation in business processes and data-driven solutions. I hold a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration with a concentration in Finance and a minor in Economics from the University of Oregon.

work.summary: Business Analyst with a focus on data science and analytics. Responsible for analyzing business processes, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing data-driven solutions.

education.area: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
